trans-unit.source: Represents an object that arranges contextual tab groups in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个对象，它将上下文选项卡组中的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel"></xref> class.
Positions and sizes the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 定位并调整其大小在此子元素<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The size that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel"></xref> needs to position its child elements.
trans-unit.target: 大小的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel"></xref>需要定位其子元素。

trans-unit.source: The actual size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel"></xref>.

Measures the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel"></xref> in preparation of arranging them during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
trans-unit.target: 测量中的子元素<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel"></xref>在准备排列它们期间<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel.ArrangeOverride*>都会通过。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel.ArrangeOverride*>

trans-unit.source: The maximum size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel"></xref>.
The desired size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel"></xref>.
Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost*> property changes.
The old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost*> property.
The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost*> property.

Draws the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object during the render pass of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 绘制的内容的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref>对象的呈现处理过程<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object to draw.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
trans-unit.target: 在父类上设置此属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>控制和由这些子控件继承。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>

trans-unit.source: It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
trans-unit.target: 它用于访问在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>类</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>上定义的视觉样式画笔

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel.Ribbon*> dependency property.
To be added.
